sentence: Lt. Gov of Idaho Janice McGeachin, Rep. Paul Gosar (AZ-04), and Arizona State Senator Wendy Rogers all appeared at the conference via video.
author: Zachary Mueller
title: A Weekend in Orlando Demonstrates the Republican Party is Going Down a Dark Path Towards White Nationalism

sentence: While Lake did not respond to questions about Rogers, she has not distanced herself from Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ), who spoke at the same Nick Fuentes' white nationalist America First Political Action Conference in Florida.
author: Bob Brigham
title: Censured Republican is so toxic she’s become an issue in Arizona governor’s race: report

sentence: Kelly reportedly took in more than $55,000 in contributions during the last fundraising quarter of 2021 from “PACs of corporate trade groups and the Senate leadership committees of many of his fellow Democrats.” In 2021, he also took heat from the Arizona Republican Party chair Kelli Ward, Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ), and the National Republican Senatorial Committee (NRSC) for being “missing in action” and for the lack of leadership the freshman member has in the Senate.
author: Jacob Bliss
title: Poll: Democrat Mark Kelly Trails Generic Republican in AZ Senate Race
